milestones.milestoneDesc: Finalize adoption of revised department-wide policy for IT Investment Review Boards
milestones.milestoneStatusDesc: The revised policy is currently under the review of general counsel, expected to clear this stage by the end of May 2016

milestones.milestoneDesc: Conduct training for department budget officers to share new budget formulation rules including CIO staff
milestones.milestoneStatusDesc: 65 budget officer staff attended the training, including representatives from 12 agencies.

milestones.milestoneDesc: Fully install automated monitoring software on all servers in our tiered data center.
milestones.milestoneStatusDesc: Procurement for additional licenses has been finalized with the provider. Installation will begin on-site next month.
